value:
Mankind must become strong. My
sister does not seem to understand
this. It is regrettable.

In Rigel, the land I rule, the people
must become strong and self-reliant
thanks to the harsh climate.$k$pThat is how mankind should be.

You find yourself in another world,
yet you temper your spirit on the
battlefield here.$k$pYou are a true warrior in my eyes.

You are said to be only a summoner,
but I find your demeanor familiar.
Would you cross swords with me?

The people of Rigel... If only they
could be diligent in my absence,
all would be well. It vexes me.

I come to you from my place at
$Nf's side.
I grant you my protection.

Only power holds meaning.
This is a true blessing.

With this strength, I will strike down
the wicked and guide the people.

Justice without strength
means nothing.

This world holds new power, even
for me. Well done, Summoner.

I am Duma. Strength is my domain. I
created the Rigelian Empire.

I have come to know you in the time
since you called me here, Summoner.$k$pYou are a strong one. But your
strength is not the strength I hope
to see in mankind.$k$pAt times, you do approach my ideal...
But your kindness is more like my
sister Mila's.$k$pSeeing you makes me ponder what
things would have been like if we
had ruled the land together.$k$pNo, this is foolishness. A god like
me, learning from you, who is as
dirt? Pay this no heed.
でえい！
ふん！
ぐあっ…
おのれ…！
Foolish child.
Fall to ruin.
Only power holds meaning.
Thirst for me.
So be it...
Hmm...
I am called Duma. I created the Rigelian Empire. Strength is my domain.
Hm. You are the only one who has ever touched me on a whim...
A very long time ago...Mila and I came to Valentia from the land of Archanea.
Rigel is a cold and harsh land. That is why my people grew strong.
Mila governs the corrupt land of Zofia. It is...most regrettable...
When did our paths diverge... One cannot help but wonder...
If you walk the path you believe in, Summoner, I will grant you my protection.
It shall be.
Who's next?
Witness my strength.
